module.name: System Dashboard
module.description: Provides a system information dashboard, showing information about Calls, CPU, Memory, Disks, Network, and processes.
module.changelog: *15.0.15* Packaging of ver 15.0.15 *15.0.14* GraphQL API to check disk free *15.0.13* Modification related FREEI-4360-GraphQL API to check disk free *15.0.12* FREEPBX-22214 modified code to consider 'NonQual' as online for trunks *15.0.11* *15.0.10* FREEPBX-22195 incorrect speed display should be kB/s *15.0.9* FREEPBX-22122 change teh value by default, and the tooltips in advanced settings *15.0.8* FREEPBX-22122 Recent move of Intrusion Detection, causes false failure on dashboard *15.0.7* Develop add notes *15.0.6* Packaging of ver 15.0.6 *15.0.5* bump *15.0.4* Fixing FREEI-1401 *15.0.3* FREEPBX-20271 support sendmail in dashboard status *15.0.2* FREEPBX-19926 *15.0.1* Add backup
